scripts.create-keys: npm run create-server-keys && npm run create-oidc-keys
scripts.oidc-cb: wt create -n oidc-cb -d openid-client@1 -d jwk-to-pem@1 --secrets-file ./secrets/google.creds -s key_store=$(cat ./keys/oidc-client.json) ./webtasks/oidc-cb.js
scripts.oidc-authorize: wt create -n oidc-authorize -d openid-client@1 -d jwk-to-pem@1 --secrets-file ./secrets/google.creds -s key_store=$(cat ./keys/oidc-client.json) ./webtasks/oidc-authorize.js
scripts.server-token: wt create -n server-token -d oidc-token-hash@1 -d jwk-to-pem@1 --secrets-file ./secrets/server.creds -s key_store=$(cat ./keys/server.json) --parse-body ./webtasks/server-token.js
scripts.server-cb: wt create -n server-cb -d got@6 -d oidc-token-hash@1 -d jwk-to-pem@1 --secrets-file ./secrets/server.creds -s key_store=$(cat ./keys/server.json) ./webtasks/server-cb.js
scripts.deploy: npm run oidc-jwks && npm run server-jwks && npm run oidc-cb && npm run oidc-authorize && npm run server-authorize && npm run server-register && npm run server-token && npm run server-cb && npm run server-discovery
